articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Record COVID cases being broken around the world as Omicron spreads - 7NEWS
articles.description: COVID’s Omicron variant is surging across Europe. But one UK health expert says ‘there is a glimmer of Christmas hope.’
articles.content: Britain has reported another day of record COVID-19 cases, with new estimates showing swathes of Londons population are carrying the virus, underlining the relentless advance of the Omicron variant.… [+4404 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: COVID vaccination hesitancy inspires some of Europe’s most bizarre rules - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Efforts in Europe to encourage vaccine use through certificates proving vaccination, a negative test result or evidence of having had COVID have created a mountain of regulation.
articles.content:
